mapper.select: SELECT P.POST_ID,P.ISBN13,P.MEMBER_ID,P.POST_TITLE,P.POST_CONTENT,TO_CHAR(P.CREATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE ,B.TITLE,B.AUTHOR,B.COVER,B.DESCRIPTION, TO_CHAR(B.PUBDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PUBDATE ,M.NICKNAME FROM TBL_POST P JOIN TBL_BOOK B ON P.ISBN13 =B.ISBN13 JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_ID=P.MEMBER_ID WHERE P.POST_ID=#{postId}
